title: Sanctuary for All: Part 1
description: When called to the scene of a horrendous crime Will sees that the police are not being told the whole truth. His insights into the case attract the interest of Dr. Helen Magnus who introduces him to her sanctuary for 'abnormals,' creatures that have remained hidden from most of the world only appearing occasionally as characters in stories and myths.

title: Sanctuary for All: Part 2
description: While Will continues to work with Alexei, Dr. Magnus has a visitor from her past with a terrible secret.

title: Fata Morgana
description: When Dr. Magnus, Will and Ashley rescue three entombed women Will struggles to accept that the women are suffering from anything more than a group delusion, Dr. Magnus suspects that the women are much more than they appear.

title: Folding Man
description: After thieves make a dramatic escape that baffles police Dr. Magnus suspects an abnormal's involvement. The robbery reminds Will of an old FBI case he could not solve; but this time he will.

title: Kush
description: After capturing a particularly elusive abnormal the plane carrying Dr. Magnus and Will crashes while transporting the creature. Dr. Magnus and Will soon discover why this abnormal has never been captured before.

title: Nubbins
description: Dr. Magnus, Ashley and Will retrieve two species of abnormal that have the ability to camouflage so well that they are near invisible. One appears to be a vicious predator, the other a cute, furry animal but nothing is as it appears.

title: The Five
description: Dr. Magnus learns that the Cabal are planning revenge for the kidnap of the Morrigan while something has come between Dr. Magnus, Ashley and Will.

title: Edward
description: Henry comes to terms with his abnormal side, Ashley works through her feelings about her parents, and Will helps a young autistic man whose father possibly shot himself.

title: Requiem
description: Dr. Magnus' life is put in jeopardy when the team answers a call for help from within the Bermuda Triangle.

title: Warriors
description: When an old friend of Will's goes missing his wife contacts him for help. With the help of Helen and Ashley, Will finds that his friend has been taken and forced to fight underground. But as they continue to search, things start to become quite familiar to Helen.

title: Instinct
description: Desperate to get her first exclusive story, a reporter and her cameraman sneak inside an evacuated building. Inside they find Dr. Magnus and her team, and a creature greater than any of them were prepared for.

title: Revelations, Part 1
description: In an unprecedented alliance Druitt and Sherlock Holmes work with Sanctuary to deduce why normally placid abnormals are running amok. Their plan, infiltrate their prime suspect, The Cabal.

title: Revelations, Part 2
description: With Ashley and Henry in the hands of the Cabal the rest of the team venture to a remote vampire enclave to recover the last known sample of vampire blood; the power they need to defeat the Cabal.

title: End of Nights: Part 1
description: In the wake of an unexpected betrayal, the Sanctuary must pull together to figure out the Cabal's master scheme in time to save those closest to them and the whole world.

title: End of Nights: Part 2
description: The Cabal's new "Super-Abnormals" begin destroying Sanctuaries around the world. It won't be long before they launch their attack on the Old City Sanctuary, and Magnus must choose between saving Ashley and saving the Sanctuary Network.

title: Eulogy
description: Kate accidentally sets loose a baby Abnormal that she and Henry discover grows very quickly. Meanwhile, Magnus searches desperately for a way to bring back Ashley.

title: Hero
description: The Sanctuary team hunts down a man who seems to have superpowers, calling himself "The Adjuster." But they discover that his suit is the source of his power, and it is slowly killing him. But he can't get it off.

title: Pavor Nocturnus
description: When Dr. Magnus awakes to darkness, she must face a destroyed Sanctuary, city, and even world. But beneath the apocalypse, something deeper awaits her discovery if she can find it in time.

title: Fragments
description: A research scientist working for the Sanctuary Network is brutally attacked by an abnormal. While Helen Magnus tries to save the life of the scientist, the team investigates the origin of the attacker's uncharacteristically brutal behavior.

title: Veritas
description: When Bigfoot is discovered dead, all of the evidence points to Magnus. Will, Henry, and Kate must find a way to clear her name and find out who actually committed the crime before she is replaced.

title: Next Tuesday
description: While transporting a usually docile abnormal, Magnus's helicopter crashes, leaving her and Will stranded in the shaft of an abandoned oil rig. They soon find they are not alone in the water.

title: Penance
description: While an old friend of Magnus', a pouched abnormal named Jimmy, is handing over a fire elemental to the Sanctuary team, they are attacked by a gang of criminal abnormals from Chicago. The situation presents a lot of mysteries to be solved and quickly.

title: Sleepers
description: When rich youngsters begin to disappear after an apparent death and then come back to life, the trail leads Will & Magnus to a drug clinic in Mexico run by Nicola Tesla. Knowing his all-times plans, big trouble to be expected.

title: Haunted
description: When a ship full of Zulu empaths suddenly goes to wreck, John Duitt rescues them as a favor to Magnus. However a bitter discovery awaits her: his dark side is alive again and can even have a life of its own!

title: Kali: Part I
description: After peaceful Abnormals worldwide act up at the same moment, the incident is linked to an EM pulse originating in Mumbai. Will and Kate go to investigate, and they soon discover that the event may relate to a dangerously-powerful Abnormal.

title: Kali: Part II
description: Will begins to experience strange visions that are connected to the Cult of Kali. Magnus has difficulty with finding the solution to their problems.

title: Kali: Part III
description: Big Bertha is not happy, but Dr. Magnus has a suggestion for how Will might once again be able to contact her, through her Kali avatar. Third and final installment of the Kali trilogy.

title: Firewall
description: Will is having trouble recovering after his experience with Kali, but the team soon finds that insomnia is the least of his problems. Helen discovers an unbelievable gift from an equally unbelievable source.

title: Bank Job
description: When a deadly Abnormal hatches prematurely inside a bank vault and escapes, Kate, Will, and Helen must stage a hold-up to buy themselves time to search for the Abnormal before somebody dies.

title: Trail of Blood
description: The team gets a cryptic distress call that could only come from one person...Nikola Tesla (JONATHAN YOUNG).

title: Hero II: Broken Arrow
description: During an attempt by the creator of the suit to get the suit back, it latches onto Kate, who runs away to use it for her own purposes. Magnus turns to Walter to help get the suit, and Kate, back before the creator does.

title: Animus
description: While Magnus and Nikola Tesla are busy experimenting with the holographic map Henry and Will go to England to investigate werewolf sightings.

title: Breach
description: Another abnormal rendezvous goes awry, this time in a way no one could have ever seen coming.

title: For King and Country
description: With an old foe of Helen's in need of lifesaving treatment, Will learns more about the Five than he ever imagined could be true.

title: Vigilante
description: With Helen growing sicker by the day, Will must make some tough decisions; first about Adam, then about finding the real puppet master behind Father Jensen's death.

title: Hollow Men
description: The expedition to Hollow Earth is on, as the team searches for a way to cure Dr. Magnus. But instead of salvation, they may find something more sinister waiting below. Special appearance by Polly Walker from Caprica.

title: Pax Romana
description: When Hollow Earth faces much bigger threats than intruders from the surface, they must choose unlikely allies for help.

title: Hangover
description: Magnus (AMANDA TAPPING) returns home from an overnight trip to find the Sanctuary in a state of confounding chaos: Battle debris everywhere, no one in sight, and a scheduled UN Security Team inspection just hours away.

title: One Night
description: What started as an innocent first date for Will (ROBIN DUNNE) and Abby (PASCALE HUTTON), turns into a dangerous kidnapping by a gang whose leader faces certain death without their help.

title: Metamorphosis
description: Something is happening to Will, and it's up to the rest of the team to figure out what and how to stop it. Help may come from a surprising source.

title: Wingman
description: Will and Henry have dates, but fate (and a lepidoptera hominid) has other plans.

title: Awakening
description: Helen and Nikola explore an ancient Praxian stronghold, and find a little more than they were expecting. Meanwhile, Kate's past comes back to haunt her.

title: Normandy
description: Look back on younger days with the Five as they take on Nazis in 1944.

title: Carentan
description: The Sanctuary receives reports of unexplained disappearances in Carentan in the Normandy region of France and sets off to investigate the strange occurrences.

title: Out of the Blue
description: Helen and Will seem to have the perfect lives, careers, and marriages? Underneath suburbia, something lurks.

title: Into the Black
description: The exodus from Hollow Earth begins, and time is of the essence as the Sanctuary stands between the abnormal refuges and the demanding UN. As they try to maintain peace, Helen receives a surprising warning from an unexpected source.

title: Tempus
description: Adam Worth destroys Praxis and travels back in time to the 1890s to save his daughter. Dr. Magnus travels back in time to stop him before he damages the time line and destroys her future with it.

title: Uprising
description: With Magnus gone, Will is appointed the head of the Sanctuary Network. The abnormal uprising continues to get worse. Biggie and Kate are kidnapped. As expected the surface governments respond to the uprising with deadly force.

title: Untouchable
description: The UN Security Council sends a task force headed by a weasel of a man, Greg Addison, to investigate the Sanctuary. His disdain for abnormals is matched by the disdain that Magnus and team have for him.

title: Monsoon
description: Since the UN no longer backs the Sanctuary, Magnus makes other arrangements for her finances. A planned meeting in Africa with a potential banker turns into a hostage situation. Will and Henry search for an abnormal in the Old City tunnels.

title: Resistance
description: Helen and Henry break into a government abnormal research facility called SCIU - only to find it is run by Tesla. Biggie and Will deal with an annoying abnormal named Galvo.

title: Homecoming
description: Will's trip to Liberia turns bad when he suffers a head trauma from an attack. The trauma brings up powerful memories about his mothers death and the inadequacies of his father. Magnus deals with be-winged scam artist.

title: Icebreaker
description: Henry and Declan lead a team to rescue a crew of a Russian icebreaker and the abnormal passengers.

title: Fugue
description: FBI Agent Abby Corrigan's life is endangered after she is suddenly attacked by an unfamiliar abnormal during an investigation; Magnus and Will's heated debate over the best way to help Abby threatens to permanently alter their relationship.

title: Chimera
description: There is a sentient organic nanite causing havoc in the computer system in the Sanctuary. Magnus and Tesla connect their minds to the system in an effort to isolate the nanite. They find Adam Worth instead.

title: Acolyte
description: A radical group of abnormal beings plan a terrorist attack with the goal of starting a war between surface dwellers and hollow Earth inhabitants. To Magnus' disbelief, Addison, at the NSA, has proof of Biggie's leadership of the group.

title: The Depths
description: When Magnus and Will learn of a plan to capture very rare and dangerous Abnormal, they travel to a remote cave to prevent then hunt.

title: Sanctuary for None - Part I
description: When the Sanctuary is approached by an abnormal leader about a radical plan for peace, Magnus goes all in and pledges her full support. However, when Will is forced to leave the Sanctuary, his decision may just put everyone at risk.

title: Sanctuary for None: Part II
description: SCIU has surrounded the 5th Ward with troops and an electric shield that prevents them from leaving. Caleb has a virus that can turn the human population into abnormals. Magnus enacts her ultimate plan for the Sanctuary network.
